Text:
I just tried the Hybrid 10-bit encoder on a couple of my BR disks....wow!

The quality that you can put out at the 10 bit high 5 format profile is mind blowing. It makes the stuff Yify is putting out look mediocre.

i have been using handbrake, megui & tmgenc for years, but now I will only be using hybrid!
Of course. Hybrid is my main choice. I'm a huge supporter, requesting new features for it. The Developer is a friend. If you need any help with Hybrid,doom9 forum :)
Your buddy is doing a great job. i'm using the 4.16 build, and I have not had any problems. The 10bit high 5 profile remux encodes that I have have done are all amazing. thx
